statements: DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 2002 AND transaction_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND user_id = 50;
DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'withdrawal' AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = TRUE AND fraud_type = 'chargeback';
DELETE FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE status = 'flagged' AND timestamp < '2021-09-01';
DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE id = 100 AND amount > 500.00
DELETE FROM transaction_logs WHERE amount > 1000 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
